Html:
Is there a maximum number of sheets that can be created when creating an Excel file in PHP Excel?

I want to import one basic sheet (Excel 2007) then duplicate and export out with many sheets - all with different data, but the same starting sheet.

What is the limit on number of sheets when creating a new file?

I will be creating/outputting a Excel 2007 file.

In Excel itself, there is no limit other than available memory.
I've not tried breaking PHPExcel to count one way or the other, but suspect that the same limitation would apply. Certainly there is no limit implemented in the code itself.
